description: Try our easy to follow Tandoori Eggplant Skewers With Mini Pappadums recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free
name: Tandoori Eggplant Skewers With Mini Pappadums Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place eggplant on a large microwave-safe, paper towel-lined bowl. Cover eggplant with paper towel. Microwave for 2 minutes 30 seconds or until tender. Cool for 5 minutes.

Preheat a chargrill or barbecue on medium-high heat. Place tandoori paste and 1 tbs water in a large bowl. Stir to combine. Add eggplant and toss to coat. Arrange eggplant onto 8 small metal or bamboo skewers. Cook for 5 minutes, turning occasionally, or until lightly charred.

Meanwhile, juice half the lemon. Cut remaining half into wedges. Combine juice and oil in a medium bowl. Add chickpeas, onion and mint. Season with pepper and toss to combine. Arrange salad and skewers on a serving platter. Sprinkle with extra mint leaves. Serve with pappadums and lemon wedges.
